fields.name: Slim Fit Navy Stretck Suit
fields.description:
A versatile jacket for work, play and special events. You'll turn to French Connection's piece time and time again as the navy tone will bend to any occasion. 
It's cut to a slim fit that gives you a defined outline by sitting close through your body, and the full lining helps to keep its sharp shape. Wear with a crisp shirt and a bold tie to give it personality.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Grey Check Suit
fields.description:
Whether you're plugging a wardrobe gap or freshening up last season's check, Mayer's mixable grey jacket is a savvy choice. 
Designed in crease-fighting stretch cloth and woven with a navy Prince of Wales pattern, it's cut to the brand's featured tailored fit for a well-balanced shape that follows all the tried-and-true rules of men's tailoring. 
Open it up to reveal full lining that's structured in two tones for signature interest.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Blue Check Suit
fields.description:
This tailoring takes inspiration from Italian-style suits, which are typically pared-back, easy to wear and have a natural drape. 
Featuring bold checks and a ticket pocket, it also has personality while still meeting the dress code of business settings. The skinny cut ensures you look sharp with a narrow fit on the shoulders, chest and waist, while stretch in the material means you’ll have room to move. 
Complete the look with a white shirt to match the crisp look of the checks.

fields.name: Slim Fit Yale Suit
fields.description:
Tailored to a slim fit for neat, confident lines, Ted Baker's blue jacket is lifted through the addition of a characterful purple check. 
It's woven in a wool blend that features stretch, meaning it'll fight off wrinkles through the day and deliver flexible comfort to the fit. 
The brand's creative DNA is present as always at the partial lining, which is printed with a purple motif emphasised by tonal binding.

fields.name: Slim Fit Eco Blue Check Suit
fields.description:
Cut from a recycled polyester-blend cloth, this eco suit will help you do your bit for the environment. 
We’ve rescued 45 plastic bottles from landfill and our oceans to make this eco suit. That’s not all – we’ve also chosen 100% natural and biodegradable corozo nut buttons and lining fabric made with 99% post-consumer recycled polyester to limit its suit’s impact on the environment. All this and you can still expect a smooth handle and Ted Baker’s frame-defining fit. The cloth is tightly woven, so you might want to go one size up if you prefer more movement. 
Offset the blue checked fabric with a crisp white or pink shirt and complete with a patterned silk tie.

fields.name: Slim Fit Blue Slub Suit
fields.description:
The deliberate unevenness in slub fabric is what gives Mayer's single-breasted blue jacket its charm. 
Created with that characteristic melange texture, it's tailored to a slim fit to offer you pin-sharp lines for quiet confidence. 
Emphasise the silhouette by opting for a slim-cut shirt or get creative by layering a charcoal knit with a white tee.

fields.name: Slim Fit Semi Plain Navy Check Suit
fields.description:
Known for delivering classic tailoring with extra character, Mayer is a savvy place to turn when updating your officewear. 
Delivered in pure-wool cloth with a navy tone that couldn’t be easier to style, this three-piece suit is cut to a tailored fit that provides a clean, strong profile without feeling too restrictive. 
A pin at the lapel gives a little nod to the signature lining, which is bursting with bee motifs. Play up the personality your way by wearing it with a floral-print shirt.

fields.name: Slim Fit Teal Check Suit
fields.description:
A bright addition to your suit collection. 
The vivid teal tone of this suit will grab attention while the slim fit makes you look sharp when all eyes are on you. It’s a close-fitting suit and spandex in the material means it feels unrestrictive. Texture through the material gives you added on-trend style. 
All you need is a white shirt, a tie and a pocket square in a similar tone.

fields.name: Slim Fit Sky Blue Marl Suit
fields.description:
Dial up your workwear game a fair few notches with French Connection's sky-blue jacket. 
Freshening your look with its seasonal pastel colour, it's tailored in wool-blend cloth to a neat fit, trimmed with pearlised buttons and presented with a pull-out pocket square. 
The piano-faced lining features an elegant bamboo print that's echoed throughout the coordinating three-piece.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Blue Texture Suit
fields.description:
Designed in blue fabric with a creative pattern woven in, Mayer's two-piece suit is a direct hit on formal style. 
The tailored fit provides lines that skim your frame without feeling restrictive, the cloth contains a little stretch for flex you'll appreciate on manic days and the jacket is lined with two-tone panelling to emphasise the structure. 
We'd go for a classic cotton-poplin shirt and tie or switch things up with a knitted polo shirt and printed pocket square to suit the occasion.

fields.name: Slim Fit Green Suit
fields.description:
Ted Baker is known for its youthful yet professional outfits. This suit offers a fresh take on the classic suit, made with a dark green cloth. 
Cut in a slim fit, it’ll sit close to the shoulders and define the frame. It’s a quality item, with 70% wool construction. The four-button cuff and double back vent add to the classic look. 
Pair with grey knitwear for a sophisticated outfit and use your pocket square to bring some pattern and depth.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Blue Grid Check Suit
fields.description:
If it's true that clothes make the man then investing in Mayer tailoring is worth every penny. 
Scale up your workweek options with our fresh interpretation of the blue three-piece suit, patterned with a grid check for classic appeal. 
It's cut in stretch fabric to a tailored fit that gives you all the crisp lines where you need them with the benefit of easy movement.

fields.name: Slim Fit Signature Black Stripe Suit
fields.description:
Made from fabrics woven in Britain, this slim fit suit is a fine way to elevate your formalwear. 
With 100% wool, produced by Empire Mills, Yorkshire, know for supplying premium products since 1915 – especially for men's suits and jackets. We've also added traditional elements; functional cuffs and a half-canvas chest construction which offers superior shape retention and a natural lapel roll. 
Radiate the elegance of an English gentleman.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Naples Blue Suit
fields.description:
Be the exception. 
This sophisticated Naples blue jacket from Ermenegildo Zegna will see you through multiple events in your calendar. It’s cut to flatter your frame in a classic tailored fit that’s generous through the chest and slimmer at the waist. Thanks to its high-performance merino wool, it will remain crease-free so you can stay on top of your game all day long. 
For a smart business outfit, bring out the rich blue of the fabric by pairing it with a sky-blue shirt and patterned tie. Need to impress? Wear it as part of a 2-piece suit with the matching waistcoat and trousers, and don’t forget a silk pocket square in a contrasting colour to highlight the blue.

fields.name: Regular Fit Navy Black Check Suit
fields.description:
Switch out plain cloths for the contemporary character of a check. 
Moss 1851's suit is made with 2% stretch, introducing extra flexibility to the regular fit. Which you'll love for its natural lines, generous cut and day-long comfort. 
The navy base and subtle check has just the right amount of impact for everyday styling. Try it with a crisp white shirt and coordinate your tie with the lightest thread in the weave.

fields.name: Slim Fit Grey Navy Check Suit
fields.description:
Woven in a blend that's rich in virgin wool, HUGO's single-breasted jacket can bend and flex to the occasion with its navy hue and fine fabric structure. 
Pare it back with jeans or chinos to greet the weekend and mix it together with coordinating separates during the week. The infinity flex fabric and silken lining make it a breeze to wear, wherever you're heading.

fields.name: Regular Fit Grey Navy Check Suit
fields.description:
Join the ranks of the well-dressed with a little help from Mayer. 
That classic British charm for which the brand is known is stamped all over this mixable jacket, which is tailored to a regular fit in pure wool. 
A blue check deepens the impact of the fabric, while full lining ensures an easy glide over shirts or knitwear.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Blue Flannel Suit
fields.description:
Feel good; look great. Moss 1851's tailored-fit blue suit is your sure advantage for staying on point during hectic days. 
It's crafted in our premium flannel, which is rich in wool and blended with just the right amount of stretch to guarantee freedom of movement. The brushed finish offers a super-soft handfeel and stretch lining inside the jacket increases that flexibility you'll come to depend on. 
Year-round versatile but particularly foolproof as we step into cooler weather, it's guaranteed to kick your mood up a few notches when weekdays get a bit challenging.

fields.name: Navy Highlight Check Slim Fit Suit
fields.description:
Keep things interesting midweek with Moss London's intentionally versatile blue suit. 
Created in stretch fabric and tailored to a neat fit for sharp lines, it's woven with a modern check for failsafe styling with your go-to shirts and accessories. 
Wear the three elements together or break them up to satisfy any occasion.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Blue Sharkskin Suit
fields.description:
Stand out in bright blue. This suit is designed to attract attention while still sending out a smart message. 
It’s tailored to be both frame defining and comfortable by tucking in at the waist but leaving you room to move. Stretch in the material also helps. Peak lapels add a special occasion look, as does the 3-piece design. 
Look relaxed yet formal with an open-necked shirt and a pocket square. If you need to wear a tie, choose a classic silk one with some vibrant colours.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Black Suit
fields.description:
An outfit that works as hard as you do, Moss 1851's black suit is packed with high-performance features. 
Crafted in wool-rich cloth that's blended with just the right amount of Lycra, it's crease resistant to keep you looking sharp on the go and the water-repelling and anti-stain finish helps you brush off spills and splashes in an instant. 
This suit showcases the brand's featured tailored fit in a great light, offering a natural line at the shoulders and clever tapering that provides a neat and flattering effect.

fields.name: Slim Fit Cool Grey & Blue Stripe Suit
fields.description:
There’s something quite summery about the clementine check of Ted Baker’s slim-cut suit – but the grey base will allow it to transition comfortably into the cooler months too. 
Pick out the pattern with a tonal pocket square, add shades and a crisp shirt and you've got an instant winner for warm-weather occasions. Or try it with tan brogues and navy knitwear for a fresh morning commute.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Navy Twill Dress Suit
fields.description: Packing personality, Mayer's tailored-fit jacket is turned out in a navy tone to go with all your finishing touches. Topped with peak lapels for a contemporary nod, it fastens with a single button and is trimmed with satin elements to up the ante on formal finesse. The pure-wool cloth offers a refined, smooth finish you'll love.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Blue Dress Suit
fields.description:
High-end events require an evening suit that'll stand up to the dress code. 
Mayer's blue dress suit is just the ticket, crafted in wool-blend cloth and trimmed with tonal satin lapels for understated detail that'll make all the right statements. 
The tailored fit gives a strong profile, so all you need to do is select a crisp shirt.

fields.name: Slim Fit Black Dress Suit
fields.description:
The growing popularity of the double-breasted suit isn’t letting up, so it’s time you welcomed it into your eveningwear options. 
Mayer’s two-piece takes the guesswork out of getting it right with its versatile black tone and sleek fit. Satin trims provide that occasion-ready refinement you’re looking for. 
Not a fan of stiff wing collars? An open-necked black shirt will offer a confident backdrop, as long as you bring the polish with patent leather footwear.

fields.name: Slim Fit White Jacket
fields.description: For centuries white has been regarded as the warm-weather fabric of choice. With its relaxed, unstructured profile, Mayer's jacket brings contemporary style to a formalwear classic. Made from blended cloth with a low thread count, it's lightweight and breathable, but won't crease as easily as pure white. The stripped-black design makes it comfortable to wear and gives it a more natural drape. Add a dark bow tie as extra contrast if the situation calls for a smarter finish.

fields.name: Slim Fit Dark Cyan Blue Jacket
fields.description:
Go Dark Cyan Blue and stand out from the crowd. 
Inject personality into your look with this unique multi-check jacket. It’s a bold choice that will add smartness and style to an off-duty look. Add into the mix a flattering tailored fit, that allows for plenty of movement through the chest and shoulders but gives you a sharp shape thanks to its closer-cut waist, and you’ve got a standout jacket. 
Team with a light white shirt and orange tie and prepare to command attention for all the right reasons.

fields.name: Slim Fit Navy Jacket
fields.description:
Go Dark Cyan Blue and stand out from the crowd. 
Inject personality into your look with this unique multi-check jacket. It’s a bold choice that will add smartness and style to an off-duty look. Add into the mix a flattering tailored fit, that allows for plenty of movement through the chest and shoulders but gives you a sharp shape thanks to its closer-cut waist, and you’ve got a standout jacket. 
Team with a light white shirt and orange tie and prepare to command attention for all the right reasons.

fields.name: Regular Fit Grey Check Jacket
fields.description:
Reinvent how you show up on a Monday morning with Mayer's regular-fit grey check jacket. 
Crafted in stretch fabric with a windowpane check, it's tailored to a regular fit for classic lines that are easy to style. 
Two-tone panelled lining adds a touch of colour at the interior of the jacket.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Dark Grey Check Jacket
fields.description:
Vitale Barberis Canonico is Italy’s oldest mill and it uses only the finest raw materials before washing, spinning, dying and hand-finishing them in-house. 
The mill’s quality craftsmanship is reflected in its luxurious cloths. This one is made with 90% wool, which gives the bold check a refined finish. We’ve half-lined the jacket for comfort and breathability. It also has a contrasting undercollar for classic detail. Cut in a tailored fit, it will highlight the shoulders and chest while tapering through the arms. 
Wear over a knit on cold days or dress it up with a plain shirt and tie for formal occasions.

fields.name: Slim Fit Blue Donegal Jacket
fields.description: The intensely grained and subtly flecked character of Donegal cloth is what gives Mayer's jacket its enduring appeal. Cut with a contemporary slim fit for a pin-sharp outline, it's a great partner to a box-fresh shirt and a silk-jacquard tie for a play on textures we guarantee you'll enjoy.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Black Check Jacket
fields.description:
Dial up your formal collection with Mayer's balck check jacket. 
Designed in wool-rich black cloth with a solid weave for versatility, it's cut to a tailored fit for strong lines that'll deliver the goods at any black-tie event. 
Trimmed with the essential tonal sheen at the lapels for an elevated look after dark, it's lined with signature printed fabric for an unexpected touch.

fields.name: Slim Fit Blue Check Jacket
fields.description:
This tailoring takes inspiration from Italian-style suits, which are typically pared-back, easy to wear and have a natural drape. 
Featuring bold checks and a ticket pocket, it also has personality while still meeting the dress code of business settings. The skinny cut ensures you look sharp with a narrow fit on the shoulders, chest and waist, while stretch in the material means you’ll have room to move. 
Complete the look with a white shirt to match the crisp look of the checks.

fields.name: Slim Fit Navy Puppytooth Tweed Jacket
fields.description:
Impress consistently from weekday meetings to weekend events with Moss London's navy suit, patterned with a puppytooth weave that'll never fall out of favour. 
Featuring half lining and binding printed with florals for a little tucked-away creativity, it's tailored in wool-blend cloth to a bulk-beating slim fit that layers well over your choice of knits and shirts.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Green Jacket
fields.description:
Cut in pure-cotton velvet with a rich green hue, Moss 1851's dress jacket tops off a formal look with trending opulence. 
Its tailored fit creates a modern and clean outline that's complemented by a single-button closure and offset by printed lining hidden away inside. 
Layer it over black knitwear for a confident evening ensemble or mix it up with an Oxford shirt and printed pocket square.

fields.name: Henry Box Check Jacket
fields.description: Mayer's beautiful Glen Check men's jacket is part of the seasonal heritage collection. Providing a classic look for the modern man's wardrobe. Navy and light blue blend together to create this distinctive look of sophisticated elegance.

fields.name: Mayer Multi Check Wool/Silk/Linen Jacket
fields.description: Mayer's Mulit Check Wool/Silk/Linen Mens Jacket is the ultimate in hybrid jacket design. This wonderful piece encapsulates the strengths of three of the major textiles in a hugely beneficial way. The 40% wool content gives it the sturdy and reliable feel, the 35% silk adds the decadent softness and the 25% linen offers the breath-ability for hotter weather.

fields.name: Silk Cashmere Jacket
fields.description: Add some elegance to your outfit with this exquisite jacket from Mayer. A versatile tone of burgundy will allow you to fit this piece into many outfits, from days in the office to nights in the city.

fields.name: Wool Slim Fit Navy Check Jacket
fields.description:
Crafted from pure wool, this suit jacket from Mayer will add some modern sophistication to your formal wardrobe. 
Cut to a slim contemporary fit, it is single breasted and features padded shoulders and notch lapels. Completed with patch pockets, a two button fastening and buttoned sleeve cuffs- you will be reaching for this for a sleek look. 
Combine with the matching trousers and waistcoat to complete a striking three-piece ensemble.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Wool, Silk & Linen Blend Grey Jacket
fields.description:
Crafted from pure wool, silk and linen this jacket will make a sharp addition to your formal wardrobe. 
Cut to a tailored fit with elegant peak lapels, the two-button front, flap front pockets, and double-vented reverse add traditional details.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Lined Navy Jacket
fields.description: This Mayer Jacket is the perfect addition to your wardrobe, years of experience allows us to create the ideal jacket.

fields.name: Regular Fit Wool, Silk & Linen Blend Wine Jacket
fields.description: Stylish tailored regular fit jacket in a linen, wool and silk blend.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Navy Check Tweed Waistcoat
fields.description:
The trick for working classic tweed with current form? It all lies in the fit. 
Complete Mayer’s three-piece with this navy waistcoat, deftly cut to a tailored fit that’ll provide strong lines without feeling too restrictive. 
The textured weave of the fabric is given a modern boost with a contrasting windowpane check, so keep your shirt and tie plain to avoid overdoing the detail.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Blue Grid Check Double Breasted Waistcoat
fields.description:
Whether you style it with the jacket and trousers or let it fly solo, Mayer's blue tailored-fit waistcoat ticks off your must-haves. 
The cloth? Woven with plenty of stretch for easy movement and pepped up with a tonal check. The fit? Tailored to sit neatly at your upper torso then taper in slightly at the waist. 
And the navy lining adds a polished finish that's all about quiet confidence.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Grey Blue Charcoal Check Waistcoat
fields.description: Elevate your formalwear with this check waistcoat. Designed with an adjustable back and five-button fastening.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Navy Waistcoat
fields.description:
Whether you’re wearing it for business or a special gathering, Mayer’s waistcoat will deliver the style points every time. 
Cut to a strong tailored fit, it’s crafted in navy wool yarns woven with a subtle structure and features a contrast silken backing in a gold effect.

fields.name: Printed Dot Navy Dress Shirt
fields.description:
This classic dotted dress shirts made to be worn with ease. Pair with any tie your closet has to offer. 
The best selling printed dots dress shirt is back and with more colors! This men's dress shirt is great for the office and date night, it's just as easy as rolling up the sleeves and keeping it an open collar.

fields.name: Polished Chambray Blue Dress Shirt
fields.description:
Add the Polished Chambray Blue Dress Shirt to your wardrobe today. 
The mature older brother of our chambray dress shirt. This dress shirt provides a more polished look with tonal stitching details and a bit of sheen that is great for meetings or any occasion you need to make an impression.

fields.name: Printed Dot White Dress Shirt
fields.description:
Add interest to your business attire and slip on our Printed Dot white dress shirt. Or layer it under a cardigan this weekend. 
Add some fun to your wardrobe with this printed all-over polka dot white dress shirt. Great for work and any weekend wedding.

fields.name: Pinpoint Solid - Button-Down Collar White Non-Iron Dress Shirt
fields.description:
Add the Pinpoint Solid - Button-Down Collar White Non-Iron Dress Shirt to your wardrobe today. 
Our favorite go-to solid dress shirt with a button-down collar that lends itself to more casual occasions, so save this guy for casual Fridays or weekend events.

fields.name: Multicolored Check Navy Casual Shirt
fields.description:
Add the Multicolored Check Navy Casual Shirt to your wardrobe today. 
This casual blue multicolored checked dress shirt is a must have for your spring wardrobe. It can easily be dressed up with a suit and tie for work or worn untucked for more casual occasions.

fields.name: Floral Pattern Grey Dress Shirt
fields.description:
Tired of traditional dress shirts in solid colors or striped patterns? This floral pattern grey dress shirt is PERFECT for those looking to change up their look in style.. 
Made to your measurements.

fields.name: Chambray Indigo Dress Shirt
fields.description:
Love the look of denim but want a lighter fabric? Our Chambray Indigo shirt looks amazing with summery cotton ties and wool ties for Fall. 
The casual staple for every wardrobe. This solid chambray shirt can be worn for work and play, so don't be afraid to dress it up.

fields.name: White Blue Stripe Short Sleeve Shirt
fields.description:
Add the White Blue Stripe Short Sleeve Shirt to your wardrobe today. 
This white blue striped short sleeve shirt is the perfect choice for those busy summer days when you have to run from work to a date night after! Style tip: roll the short sleeve cuff just once unevenly for more style and less perfection.

fields.name: Multi Camp Stripe Navy Short Sleeve Shirt
fields.description:
Add the Multi Camp Stripe Navy Short Sleeve Shirt to your wardrobe today. 
This multi-colored striped short sleeve shirt is the perfect choice for those busy summer days when you have to run from work to a date night after! Style tip: roll the short sleeve cuff just once unevenly for more style and less perfection.

fields.name: Purple Patterned Dress Shirt
fields.description: This popular purple pattern dress shirt is a one-of-kind dress shirt that presents itself in blue and purple hues depending on the lighting. The darker color dress shirt is great for evening wear or casual attire.

fields.name: Navy Blue Textured Dress Shirt
fields.description: The trim inside the collar sports a bright red that gives this navy blue dress shirt vibrancy and personality. This dress shirt is great for happy hours, evening wear, or going to events with friends.

fields.name: Classic Gingham Sky Blue Non-Iron Dress Shirt With Red Tie
fields.description:
Add the Classic Gingham Sky Blue Non-Iron Dress Shirt With Red Tie to your wardrobe today. 
The timeless gingham dress shirt in a light blue is perfect for summer. This dress shirt can easily take you from work to happy hour, keeping you looking your absolute best on hot summer days.

fields.name: Navy Dress Shirt With White Dots and Dark Blue Printed Tie
fields.description: These shirt is made from a cotton-blend fabric in an easy-to-iron and crease-resistant finish. Comes in with a dark blue tie, perfect for stocking up on formalwear.

fields.name: White Linen Shirt with Black Tie
fields.description: Enjoy wearing linen this season without all the wrinkles! This white non-iron linen shirt can easily be dressed up with a suit and tie or worn untucked for more casual occasions.

fields.name: White Cotton Royal Oxford Shirt with Black Bow Tie
fields.description: The white royal oxford shirt is a timeless dressy classic, and the light-weight Tessitura Monti fabric is as sophisticated as it gets, with its fine 120s two-ply construction. Unlike many oxford weaves, this fabric weighs just 103 gms, making it perfect for all-seasonal wear.

fields.name: Printed Dot Dark Navy Dress Shirt with Purpple Tie
fields.description:
This classic dotted dress shirts made to be worn with ease. Pair with any tie your closet has to offer. 
The best selling printed dots dress shirt is back and with more colors! This men's dress shirt is great for the office and date night, it's just as easy as rolling up the sleeves and keeping it an open collar.

fields.name: Non-Iron Orange Shirt with Floral Pattern Green Tie
fields.description: We've engineered the world's most innovative non-iron fabric: SafeCotton. For years, shirting companies used a cocktail of chemicals (like formaldehyde) to create non-irons. Our process removes wrinkles and chemicals, all while improving softness to deliver a handfeel like no other. So go ahead, try it: after all, feeling is believing!

fields.name: The Modern-Fit Oxford Lavender Casual Shirt with Navy Tie
fields.description:
Add the The Modern-Fit Oxford Lavender Casual Shirt to your wardrobe today. 
Our take on the classic oxford, this modern version is truly meant for any day of the week. This versatile lavender oxford can easily be dressed up for work with a tie or worn on it's own for more casual occasions.

fields.name: Point Collar Light Blue Dress Shirt with Multi Color Tie
fields.description:
Our shirt hero! The Pinpoint Solid light blue shirt will stand up to any pant in your closet. 
The Pinpoint solid dress shirt in a light blue with a modern point collar that will become your favorite dress shirt for all occasions. From the board room to a weekend wedding, this dress shirt can be dressed up or down.

fields.name: Light Blue Long Sleeve Shirt with Black Tie
fields.description: This cotton shirt is perfect for any summer activity or layered under a suit making it truly versatile.

fields.name: White Dots Shirt with Pattern Blue Tie
fields.description: A white dress shirt featuring contrast collars and rounded cuffs. This dress shirt is perfect for an eccentric casual outfit and a popular choice for a casual putting.

fields.name: Cabana Stripe Royal Blue Non-Iron Dress Shirt with Red Tie
fields.description:
Cabana Add the Cabana Stripe Royal Blue Non-Iron Dress Shirt to your wardrobe today. 
This royal blue Cabana Stripe men's dress shirt is the perfect alternative to your staple pinstripe blue work shirt. This bold stripe can brighten up any outfit and put a pep in your step no matter the occasion.

fields.name: Gingham Orange Non-Iron Dress Shirt with Dot Navy Tie
fields.description:
Add the Gingham Orange Non-Iron Dress Shirt to your wardrobe today. 
This orange Gingham dress shirt's middle name is bold and it's going all-in on one of the summer's most popular trends: neon. This orange dress shirt is versatile for summer, we love dressing this down for summer pool parties and bbqs.

fields.name: White Men's Tuxedo Shirt with Silver Natte Silk Tie
fields.description:
Add the Gingham Orange Non-Iron Dress Shirt to your wardrobe today. 
This orange Gingham dress shirt's middle name is bold and it's going all-in on one of the summer's most popular trends: neon. This orange dress shirt is versatile for summer, we love dressing this down for summer pool parties and bbqs.

fields.name: Slim Fit Navy Stripe Stretch Trousers
fields.description:
Earn your stripes. 
Turn to classic pinstripe for an effortlessly smart office look that never goes out of style. The skinny fit of these Mayer trousers will sit close to your frame and add an updated touch to the timeless pattern. Easy to maintain and comfortable, they’re made with a machine-washable, brushed stretch fabric that will stay smart wear after wear. 
Pair with a crisp white shirt and black patent loafers for an on-trend, stylish look.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Navy Check Trousers
fields.description:
Revive your interest in creating Monday-to-Friday looks with Mayer’s endlessly versatile trousers. 
Cut to a tailored fit for a strong shape that allows a little room around the seat and thighs, they're delivered in an adaptable shade of navy patterned with a tonal check that’ll lift any formal look in an instant. 
We like to balance them with leather lace-ups and a textured blue shirt.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Blue Check Trousers
fields.description:
Woven in wool-rich yarns, Mayer's blue trousers add instant energy to your formal options. 
A tonal check lifts the fabric and coordinates tonally with the lining, while a front crease and minimalist closure sit smartly alongside the fit.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Navy Stretch Chino Trousers
fields.description: Using the same sturdy twill weave that makes denim such an enduring choice, Mayer's chinos deliver the goods from Monday through to Sunday. From more laid-back workwear looks to off-duty outfits come the evening, their deep navy tone and neat tailored fit will offer just the foundation you're after. The stretch-cotton fabric seals the deal, debsoting a flexible feel you'll appreciate as you go about your day.

fields.name: Slim Fit Charcoal Flannel Trousers
fields.description:
Tailored on a slim block for sleek lines, French Connection's trousers are cut in grey flannel to bring you a whole host of styling options. 
All you need is a crisp white shirt and glossy patent loafers for instant polish.

fields.name: Slim Fit Blue Check Trousers
fields.description:
Tailored on a slim block for sleek lines, French Connection's trousers are cut in grey flannel to bring you a whole host of styling options. 
All you need is a crisp white shirt and glossy patent loafers for instant polish.

fields.name: Slim Fit Grey Navy Blue Dogtooth Trousers
fields.description:
Break that plain trouser habit. 
Reach for these bold trousers the next time you need to impress. With their tweed-inspired dogtooth design and cropped length, they’re ideal for showing off your frame and letting your shoes take centre stage. Thanks to their machine washable material with stretch, they’re also comfortable and simple to care for. 
Contrast the grey and navy of the check with a crisp white skinny fit shirt. Complete the look with a pair of grey Derby shoes.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Black Stretch Trousers
fields.description:
Wardrobe staples you’ll be thankful to own. 
Whether it’s a formal event or work, you can reach for these classic black trousers. They’ll taper down your legs without feeling too close fitting, giving you a smart outline. Stretch in the fabric keeps you comfortable and they’re machine washable for quick and easy care. 
Wear with a contrasting grey jacket and a blue shirt for a new formal outfit. Or simply wear with a smart shirt for the office.

fields.name: Black Satin Silk Tie
fields.description: Want to move away from a bow tie for a formal accessory? This tie will do the trick with its satin fabric and simple design. Made from 100% silk, it has the polished effect you want for special occasions.

fields.name: Navy Textured Tie
fields.description:
Want to demonstrate knowhow when it comes to selecting the right tie? Mayer's option has your back. 
Woven in navy with a fine structure, its 6.5cm blade features full lining to help its shape stay stable. 
Sync it with the matching pocket square or opt for a hank with a bold pattern to show your creativity.

fields.name: Red Textured Tie
fields.description: When your outfit is calling for something bright to give it eye-catching merit, this tie is ideal. The vivid red will offset a navy suit and white shirt combination while the texture adds depth. It has a slim 5.5cm blade width, making it a sharp accessory to pair with a slim or skinny fit suit.

fields.name: Navy, Brown and Cream Club Stripe Silk Tie
fields.description:
Delivered in cool navy that'll work with all your go-to tailoring, Mayer's club-stripe tie will slot easily into your rack. 
The pure-silk yarns give a little sheen and richness to the pattern, while interlining will create and maintain a full shape at the knot and blade.

fields.name: Brown with White Dots Silk Tie
fields.description:
It's the textured weave made from silk that gives Mayer's brown tie a little extra edge. 
Patterned with white dots and interlined for a better drape, it's just the thing for livening up a workwear or special-occasion look.

fields.name: Navy with Blue Check Tie
fields.description:
Designed to complement the whole of your look rather than detract from it, Mayer's interlined tie is woven in navy yarns with a tonal check that's just detailed enough. 
Be sure to balance the width of the blade with a slim notch lapel.

fields.name: Navy & Royal Blue Club Stripe Silk Tie
fields.description:
Delivered in cool blues that'll work with all your go-to tailoring, Moss 1851's club-stripe tie will slot easily into your rack. 
The pure-silk yarns give a little sheen and richness to the pattern, while interlining will create and maintain a full shape at the knot and blade.

fields.name: Navy Puppytooth Tie
fields.description:
Woven with a tonal puppytooth motif, Moss London's navy tie is an all-rounder that'll polish up every formal look. 
The 6.5cm blade width looks sharp with a slender notch lapel, while the interlining helps it lie neatly and fully on your choice of shirt.

fields.name: Brown with White and Black Stripe Silk Tie
fields.description:
Pulling back on the formality by blending the richness of silk and cotton, Mayer's tie is a particularly great choice for cool-weather occasions and more casual events. 
The textured weave lends extra interest to the brown, and white and black stripe, while a soft interlining gives the blade and knot a fullness that's guaranteed to last.

fields.name: Canteloupe Natte with Black Dots Silk Tie
fields.description:
If plain’s too little and prints are too much, Mayer’s tie will sit comfortably in the middle. 
Crafted in silk yarns with a natté technique for a close, basket-woven structure, it’s delivered in a cantaloupe shade that’ll pair well with any tailoring you have in mind. 
Interlining keeps the tip looking full and helps it fall neatly where it should.

fields.name: Multi Colour Club Stripe Men's Tie
fields.description:
A traditional multi colour club stripe with modern knowhow, Mayer's tie is crafted in pure-silk yarns for a smooth finish that'll work for any occasion. 
The interlining helps it lie with a natural drape and the 7.5cm blade width works beautifully alongside a slim notch lapel.

fields.name: Franzisko Square Black and Silver Pattern Cufflinks
fields.description:
These square design BOSS cufflinks are ideal for any occasion, adding the finishing touch to your formal wear with their understated yet impactful design. 
Made from durable polished brass with a black inlay, on which you'll find the famous Hugo Boss name, these cufflinks are the ultimate in modern elegance.

fields.name: Classic Silver with Black Onyx Cufflinks
fields.description:
A natural style mate for black dress-shirt studs, Moss 1851’s brass cufflinks are crafted with an onyx centre set inside a ribbed frame. 
Their clean design features a click that’ll fasten neatly through a French cuff, delivering a direct hit on formal polish.

fields.name: Silver Rectangular Black Stripe Cufflinks
fields.description:
Complete a sharp tailored ensemble with these Paul Smith cufflinks. 
Made from polished metal in a rectangular design, they're inlaid with the brand's signature stripe motif in ribbon for textural appeal.

fields.name: GM Black Silver Square Cufflinks
fields.description: These simple cufflinks will go with any smart outfit. With a black silver colour, they’ll lend a subtle contrast to a lighter-toned shirt.

fields.name: Union Jack Flag Silver Cufflinks
fields.description: Add the Union Jack Flag Silver Cufflinks to your wardrobe today.

fields.name: Silver Rectangular Plaque Cufflinks
fields.description:
Add a formal accessory to your assortment with these Cufflinks from Mulberry. Crafted from brass, they feature a rectangular plaque with a Mulberry tree embossing, a curved T-bar design and swivel-back fastening. 
These come presented in a gift box.

fields.name: GM Silver Knot Cufflinks
fields.description: These classic Mayer silver metal knot cufflinks are the perfect finising touch to all your formal outfits. Great for both special ocassions and business wear.

fields.name: Silver Tone and Black Enamel Tie Clip
fields.description:
The functional part of your wardrobe can also express your personality. Our black enamel tie bar is meant for the rugged and cool. 
This silver black enamel tie bar is one of our most popular tie bars. It's perfect for a day at the office or special occasion.

fields.name: Silver Patterned and Black Enamel Tie Clip
fields.description: A tie clip is generally used to hold a tie in place, but they’re also sharp styling accessories. This one by Mayer features a silver pattern to bring extra depth to your outfit.

fields.name: Gold Patterned and Black Enamel Tie Clip
fields.description: A tie clip is generally used to hold a tie in place, but they’re also sharp styling accessories. This one by Mayer features a silver pattern to bring extra depth to your outfit.

fields.name: Black Enamel with Silver Stripe Tie Clip
fields.description: Used to accentuate a tie and also to optionally hold it in place with a shirt, this is a functional accessory for the dapper gentleman to enjoy.

fields.name: Silver Classic Textured Tie Clip
fields.description: This Mayer textured tie bar is the perfect stylish addtion to your wardrobe. This tie bar is great for work or special ocassions.

fields.name: Navy Bow Tie with Silver Metal Edge
fields.description: Give your black-tie look the edge with this silver metal edge bow tie. It will go with almost any tux and it’s pre-tied to help you get ready in no-time.

fields.name: Yacht Checks Navy Red Bow Tie
fields.description: Add the Yacht Checks Navy Red Bow Tie to your wardrobe today.

fields.name: GM Black Skinny Bow Tie
fields.description:
Pre-tied for fans of the easy life, Mayer's bow tie is cut to a skinny profile that'll bring a shot of modern edge to a black-tie outfit. 
It's woven with a subtle structure and delivered in black to pull your look together in a flash.

fields.name: GM Teal Anchor Check Bow Tie
fields.description: Add the GM Teal Anchor Check Bow Tie to your wardrobe today.

fields.name: Black Silk Bow Tie
fields.description:
In order to avoid falling at the final formal hurdle, choose your bow tie wisely. 
Crafted in pure silk with a classic butterfly shape, Mayer’s black silhouette strikes all the right notes. Plus it’s pre-tied for fans of the easy life.

fields.name: GM Grey and Black Check Bow Tie
fields.description:
An extra-special occasion calls for a standout accessory – enter the grey and black check bow tie. 
Thanks to its pre-tied nature and hardy weave, the crisp symmetry of Moss 1851's butterfly will stand strong through even the most drawn-out events.

fields.name: Wine Texture Bow Tie
fields.description: Take a bow. Get ready to shake up your smart attire with the addition of a modish bow tie. Textured and simple in its design, this bow tie by Mayer is easy to wear on an everyday basis, especially for those who dare to bear their bow in the office. Wear it with a textured shirt and a wool suit to achieve an on-trend look. If you want to wear it to a smart occasion, make sure you've got a navy or grey suit and a white shirt. A pocket square is the must-have addition for the snappy dresser.

fields.name: Light Champagne Texture Bow Tie
fields.description:
From wedding to work do to everything in between, Mayer’s navy bow tie will say all the right things about your style credentials. 
It’s woven in soft yarns with a tonal diamond motif, bringing a little texture to the material without going overboard. The pre-tied design will slip on with ease and the butterfly will hold its shape from welcome drinks to the cab home.

fields.name: Solid Satin Spearmint Bow Tie
fields.description:
An extra-special occasion calls for a standout accessory – enter the spearmint bow tie. 
Thanks to its pre-tied nature and hardy weave, the crisp symmetry of Mayer's butterfly will stand strong through even the most drawn-out events.

fields.name: Blush Pink Bow Tie
fields.description:
Add the Blush Pink Bow Tie to your wardrobe today. 
This blush pink textured bow tie is perfect for weddings and special occasions.

fields.name: Navy Skinny Bow Tie
fields.description:
Whether you reserve it solely for black tie or feel like styling things up at the office, Moss London’s bow tie will bend to the occasion. 
Offered in navy that’ll go with everything, it’s woven with a subtle structure and pre-tied with a skinny butterfly for pleasing symmetry that won’t let you down.

fields.name: Crystal Wave Row Pink Bow Tie
fields.description:
Add the Crystal Wave Row Pink Bow Tie to your wardrobe today. 
This pink plaid bow tie is perfect for weddings and special occasions.

fields.name: Gingham Navy Bow Tie
fields.description:
Add the Gingham Navy Bow Tie to your wardrobe today. 
This bow tie is a Wedding Favorite - Translation: it's the perfect choice for your big day or just another day at the office.

fields.name: Petite Gingham Red Navy Bow Tie
fields.description:
Add the Petite Gingham Red Bow Tie to your wardrobe today. 
Small gingham pattern made from soft cotton fabric.

fields.name: Seersucker Midnight Navy Bow Tie
fields.description: Add the Seersucker Midnight Navy Bow Tie to your wardrobe today.

fields.name: Moody Florals Navy Bow Tie
fields.description: Add the Moody Florals Navy Bow Tie to your wardrobe today.

fields.name: Solid Suede Navy Belt
fields.description: The Mayer Belts Collection is designed with the same careful attention to quality and detail that has evolved during more than a century of shoemaking experience. Our Navy Suede Belt is fully leather lined with a hand finished, silver coloured buckle.

fields.name: Black Leather Belt
fields.description: Slip on this poised and practical leather belt for a go-to staple that adds another level to your style game. Choose to loop around off-duty jeans to set off your favourite shirt and switch up something casual. Or, pair with the right suit to work some extra flair from your office outfits. Whether you’re heading to town or off to the office, the premium look and feel of real leather will add proper polish to whatever you wear. Choose one size bigger than your usual trouser waist size to ensure a good fit.

fields.name: Tan Leather Belt
fields.description: Missing a wardrobe essential? Mayer's tan leather belt is a must-have accessory designed to complement a huge range of casual and formal looks. Wear it to any event that calls for casual sophistication, this premium belt is made from leather for a quality look and feel. It'll do a great job wrapped around a pair of formal suit trousers and look just as much at home holding up some weekend chinos. For a formal look you'll turn to time and again, team this belt with a bright blue suit and don't forget the matching tan derby shoes. Choose one size bigger than your usual trouser waist size to ensure a good fit.

fields.name: Navy Suede Belt
fields.description: The Mayer Belts Collection is designed with the same careful attention to quality and detail that has evolved during more than a century of shoemaking experience. Our Navy Suede Belt is fully leather lined with a hand finished, silver coloured buckle.

fields.name: Dark Brown Rough-Out Suede Belt
fields.description: The Mayer Belts Collection is designed with the same careful attention to quality and detail that has evolved during more than a century of shoemaking experience. Our Dark Brown Rough-Out Suede Belt is fully leather lined with a hand finished, brass coloured buckle.

fields.name: Brown Leather Belt
fields.description: This leather belt from Mayer lets you pull your outfit together with style to spare. Flexibility is the key. You can loop it through a pair of jeans or chinos for classic off-duty cool, or instantly upgrade your go-to work wardrobe by wearing it with a suit. The look and feel of real leather adds a sophisticated edge, and transforms a practical staple into something special you’ll want to wear every day. Choose one size bigger than your usual trouser waist size to ensure a good fit.

fields.name: Cognac Belt
fields.description: Upgrade your smart casual outfits with the help of this Mayer belt. The versatile cognac shade can be dressed up or down and the minimalist buckle will add sophistication to your look. Simply loop it through jeans or skinny fit trousers and you’re good to go.

fields.name: Black Tumbled Leather Belt
fields.description: This S & M belt is in a highly versatile black shade, making it easy to style whatever the occasion. Statement red stitching adds interest, while the silver single tongue buckle is smart and simple.

fields.name: GEXTER Leather Black Belt
fields.description: Upgrade your smart casual outfits with the help of this Mayer belt. This leather belt from Mayer lets you pull your outfit together with style to spare.

fields.name: MTL Brown Belt
fields.description:
Cut in brown leather that’ll sit confidently alongside on-form and casual looks alike, Mayer’s belt is a versatile addition to your capsule. 
Tonal stitching adds a refined touch at the edges, while rectangle buckle introduces polish to chinos, denim or deftly tailored suits.

fields.name: ADO Brown Belt
fields.description: With its brown shade and contrast tonal stitching, this Mayer belt is an essential addition to any smart wardrobe. Go off-duty by pairing it with navy chinos or use it to add contrast to a sharp blue suit.

fields.name: Guildhall Black Oxford Shoes
fields.description:
Put your best foot forward in these black Oxfords. 
Selecting the right shoes is essential to crafting the ultimate suited look. These sleek black Oxfords from Northampton-based shoemaker Mirage feature leather uppers and soles, along with a leather and textile lining for superior comfort. 
Oxford-style lacing should be your go-to choice for the smartest occasions. Pair with a modern black business suit or a grey wedding outfit for a knockout combination.

fields.name: Alberta Black Performance Derby Shoes
fields.description: With a design that’s smart and simple, these black Derby shoes are a classic choice that will pair with a huge range of outfits. Crafted in smooth leather they’re designed for long-lasting performance with a soft, flexible fit that wraps around the foot for enhanced comfort.

fields.name: Chelsea 11 Dark Brown Scotch Grain Shoes
fields.description: Chelsea 11, a hearty version of our infamous Chelsea 5. Made using the finest dark brown scotch grain with an oversized cleated rubber sole from Vibram and a storm welt for added water resistance. Chelsea 11 is the ultimate chelsea for Winter. From the Men's Main Collection.

fields.name: Chelsea 5 Dark Brown Wax Calf Shoes
fields.description: Chelsea 5, a Chelsea boot made from fine quality dark brown waxed calf leather for added water resistance, with Dainite rubber soles. From the Men's Main Collection.

fields.name: Belmont Brown Brogue Boot Shoes
fields.description:
Equal parts rugged and refined, the Belmont boot from Moss London is ideal when you feel like giving your trainers the day off. 
Punctuated from heel to toe with brogueing and delivered in black to go with everything, they're pulled together with firm midsole stitching to ensure they keep going through the seasons.

fields.name: Boone White Shoes
fields.description: Cut in a classic silhouette, these Boone sneakers by Brother x Frère will style well with your everyday wear.

fields.name: Haden Blue Shoes
fields.description: Brother x Frère approach to the saddle loafer are ideal for everyday wear. Crafted with Italian soft suedes.

fields.name: Dalston White Leather Smart Trainer
fields.description: Fresh in white Italian leather with a navy counter trim, Moss Bros’ Dalston trainer forms a critical part of any man’s wardrobe. Ideal for styling with chinos and a simple white T-shirt, they’ve been hand crafted in Portugal with cushioned footbeds for increased support underfoot. Try them with tailoring to bring a sportive note to workwear.

fields.name: The Caine Bit Tobacco Loafer
fields.description: Add some metal hardware for a sporty look that you can pull off in the office or on the go. Make the Caine bit loafer yours.

fields.name: The Van Damme Belgian Black Loafer
fields.description: Our Belgian loafer is the perfect combination of quality, comfort and elegance. Looking for something other than a penny loafer? The Van Damme belgian loafer is the perfect substitute.

fields.name: The Van Damme Belgian Oxblood Loafer
fields.description: Our Belgian loafer is the perfect combination of quality, comfort and elegance. Looking for something other than a penny loafer? The Van Damme belgian loafer is the perfect substitute.

fields.name: The Stewart Penny Tobacco Loafer
fields.description: The Stewart is the loafer you'll never stop wearing. Stylish, comfortable and devilishly handsome, our penny loafer may be the most versatile shoe in your wardrobe.

fields.name: The Burton Double Monk Tobacco Strap
fields.description: The Burton double monk is built on an aggressive last but detailed with a refined cap toe to make sure he behaves. Pair wells with denim and just about everything else.

fields.name: Crawford Dark Brown Antique Calf
fields.description: Crawford, a penny loafer made from the finest dark brown antique calf leather and bark tanned single leather soles. From the Hand Grade collection.

fields.name: The Olivier Single Monk Black Strap
fields.description: Our single monk strap exudes elegance with its sleek lines and stylish buckle. Luxuriate in the simplicity of the Olivier.

fields.name: Bray Tan Lightweight Brogue Shoes
fields.description:
For smart and casual. 
You can’t beat these brogues for versatility. They’re smart enough for work but will also look the part at weekends. It’s thanks to their classic brogue shape and chunky sole. The tan colour goes with most outfits, and they’re made from leather for long-lasting comfort. 
For work, pair with smart chinos, and for play, turn to your jeans – they’ll look just as good with both and will match any colour.

fields.name: Tetbury Black Wax Calf
fields.description: Tetbury, a plain fronted chukka boot made from the finest black wax calf with Dainite rubber soles. From the Men's Main Collection.

fields.name: Hatchon Black Patent Dress Shoes
fields.description: Suit sorted, now for the shoes. Moss London has sorted out the whole of your red-carpet attire with the perfect finishing touch – patent dress shoes. Why not go all out at your next black tie event with an attention-grabbing pair of patent brogues. Elegant and dressed-up with simple broguing just on the toe, they make the right kind of statement: dapper. The black colour will go with most dress suits, from plain black and cream to patterned alternatives. Wear with your dress suit and give these shoes a good polish before you leave the house so they shine all night long.

fields.name: McAllister Wingtip Oxford with Dainite Rubber Sole
fields.description:
Look your best in these Dark Chilli Oxfords. 
Elegant and expertly-crafted, these smart Oxford shoes by Allen Edmonds will complete any formal outfit. They’re made from rich dark chilli leather with a burnished toecap for an on-trend look and feature a leather and textile lining to ensure superior comfort. 
Pair these shoes with a sharp navy suit for a wedding outfit that’ll turn heads. For the office, try them with tailored grey trousers and a crisp white shirt.

fields.name: The Martin Wholecut Dark Blue
fields.description: The Martin is the sharpest dress shoe you'll ever own. Made from a single piece of Italian calfskin leather, this wholecut oxford has a sleek profile that is guaranteed to turn heads.

fields.name: The Cagney Cap-Toe Oxford Oxblood
fields.description: Let our cap-toe oxford faithfully serve as the foundation of your shoe collection. The Cagney sports double-blind stitching on the toe and vamp for a ridiculously clean look. We've got your entire wardrobe covered.

fields.name: The Cagney Cap-Toe Oxford Chocolate
fields.description: Let our cap-toe oxford faithfully serve as the foundation of your shoe collection. The Cagney sports double-blind stitching on the toe and vamp for a ridiculously clean look. We've got your entire wardrobe covered.

fields.name: Rutland Brown Suede Brogue
fields.description: Slightly more casual than your formal lace-ups, the brogue is a savvy choice for your regular playbook. John White's leather-lined Rutland is crafted in soft brown suede and features punched perforations at the uppers, so roll your cuffs to let the detail take centre stage.

fields.name: Strandmok Cap-Toe Oxford with Dainite Rubber Sole
fields.description:
It’s time for something a bit special. 
A top-notch suit deserves to be paired with equally impressive footwear. Bring out the big guns by opting for these brown Oxfords from renowned American shoemaker Allen Edmonds. Quality materials, expert stitching and the finest brogue detailing are all on display here. Comfortable too thanks to a cushioned lining, these shoes are designed to shine under the spotlight. 
Oxford lacing is ideal for smarter occasions, while classy broguing will give your appearance a playful edge. Pair with a blue suit for maximum impact.

fields.name: Walnut Strand Oxford Sneaker
fields.description:
Our best-selling Strand, now available as a sneaker. 
Six-eyelet lace-up Oxford dress sneaker with brogue details. 
Dress casual style, perfect any way you wear it

fields.name: The Martin Wholecut Chestnut
fields.description: The Martin is the sharpest dress shoe you'll ever own. Made from a single piece of Italian calfskin leather, this wholecut oxford has a sleek profile that is guaranteed to turn heads.

fields.name: Red Shark Navy Cool Dress Socks
fields.description: With their on-trend, understated colours and cotton-rich stretch fabric, these Mayer socks are well-suited to everyday smart looks. Pair with a navy or burgundy suit for a sharp, coordinated look right down to the last details.

fields.name: Red Dot Navy Cool Dress Socks
fields.description: With their on-trend, understated colours and cotton-rich stretch fabric, these Mayer socks are well-suited to everyday smart looks. Pair with a navy or burgundy suit for a sharp, coordinated look right down to the last details.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Black Cashmere Coat
fields.description:
Stylish layering for every occasion. 
Made from soft, warm cashmere in versatile black, this overcoat from Mayer will elevate any formal look during the colder months. The single-breasted design features 3-button fastening, notch lapels and a single vent, while straight pockets keep essentials safe. It’s designed to be worn over a jacket, and the tailored fit will complement the lines of any sharp suit. 
Pair with a crisp white shirt and a 3-piece grey suit for a solid look, using black Oxford shoes to complete the picture.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Camel Double Face with Grey Overcoat
fields.description:
Bring colour to cold days in camel. 
With its on-trend colour and classic tailored fit, this Mayer overcoat combines style, comfort and warmth - everything you need when the cold bites. Crafted in double face fabric for texture, it also features half-lining with a light grey internal for stylish contrast, plus a peak lapel to add interest to your collar. 
Wear it with an oatmeal polo neck jumper and a grey flannel suit for a look that works for the office or smart-casual occasions.

fields.name: Slim Fit Teal Overcoat
fields.description:
Gloomier commutes call for a more confident choice in colour. So blend Mayer's slim-fit overcoat into your daily grind and we guarantee it'll add a little lift to slow-starter mornings. 
Designed in soft cloth blended with wool and detailed with contrasting split lining, it's just the thing for layering over a deftly cut suit. But it'll deliver just as well over a more relaxed look. 
Turn up the collar on layered-up days to reveal a subtle panel of contrast.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Camel Cashmere Coat
fields.description:
Rely on tailored cashmere when the weather turns. 
Present a polished appearance in any weather with the help of this luxurious overcoat from Mayer. Made from fabric selected for its warmth and softness, you’ll be sharply dressed for the office or evenings out. It’s cut for a tailored fit that’ll lie snug next to a jacket and create a contemporary, frame-flattering profile. 
This coat’s camel tone is ideal from bringing colour to dark suits on overcast days. A patterned scarf will add extra warmth and vibrancy.

fields.name: Slim Fit Light Grey Overcoat
fields.description:
A versatile approach to an autumn/winter essential, Moss London's light-grey overcoat is cut to a frame-defining slim fit so you can layer up and beat the bulk. 
We've crafted it in a soft blend that contains wool and added a subtle contrast at the undercollar – perfect for popping up for coverage while highlighting the peak lapels. 
Try it over a burgundy zip-neck knit on fresh days.

fields.name: Tailored Fit Navy Epsom Overcoat
fields.description:
Layer up in confidence this season with the classic lines of Mayer's navy Epsom coat. 
Cut to a tailored fit that's all about balanced proportions, it's crafted in a wool blend for a rich effect. But you're not investing in one look here – you're getting three. 
Leave the tonal wadded insert behind as the temperatures begin to rise, then add it in and zip it up when they really plummet. In-between weather is the time to style the insert solo as a core-warmer over a shirt or knitwear.
